description: Uploads position update data for one or more devices to a tracker resource (up to 10 devices per batch). Amazon Location uses the data when it reports the last known device position and position history. Amazon Location retains location data for 30 days.

parameters.name: TrackerName
parameters.description: The name of the tracker resource to update.

parameters.name: Updates
parameters.description: Contains the position update details for each device, up to 10 devices. (dict) --- Contains the position update details for a device. The device associated to the position update. The timestamp at which the device's position was determined. Uses ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ The latest device position defined in WGS 84 format: [X or longitude, Y or latitude]. (float) --- Accuracy (dict) --- The accuracy of the device position. Estimated maximum distance, in meters, between the measured position and the true position of a device, along the Earth's surface. PositionProperties (dict) --- Associates one of more properties with the position update. A property is a key-value pair stored with the position update and added to any geofence event the update may trigger. Format: "key" : "value" (string) --- (string) ---

nested_params.name: DeviceId
nested_params.description: The device associated to the position update.

nested_params.name: SampleTime
nested_params.description: The timestamp at which the device's position was determined. Uses ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_params.name: Position
nested_params.description: The latest device position defined in WGS 84 format: [X or longitude, Y or latitude].

nested_params.name: Accuracy
nested_params.description: The accuracy of the device position.

nested_params.name: Horizontal
nested_params.description: Estimated maximum distance, in meters, between the measured position and the true position of a device, along the Earth's surface.

nested_params.name: PositionProperties
nested_params.description: Associates one of more properties with the position update. A property is a key-value pair stored with the position update and added to any geofence event the update may trigger. Format: "key" : "value"

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: Contains error details for each device that failed to update its position.

nested_items.name: DeviceId
nested_items.description: The device associated with the failed location update.

nested_items.name: SampleTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the device position was determined. Uses ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The error code associated with the batch request error.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A message with the reason for the batch request error.
